summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the employment history of Belford L. Lawson III within the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). It includes payroll authorization forms indicating various appointments, salary adjustments, and Lawson's termination, spanning from December 1, 1976, to December 31, 1978. The forms detail Lawsonâ€™s role as Staff Counsel, along with his corresponding gross annual salary, which varied between $12,300 and $27,100. Additionally, the collection contains a memorandum dated January 3, 1977, requesting all staff employees to disclose any familial relationships with current members of Congress for payroll certification purposes, ensuring compliance with regulations prohibiting the employment of relatives.
